title: Satmar Rebbes Lead Protest
body: Thousands gathered outside the Israeli Consulate in Manhattan, led by Satmar Rebbes Rav Aharon Teitelbaum and Rav Zalman Leib Teitelbaum, to protest the arrest of yeshiva bochurim for refusing military conscription in Eretz Yisroel.

title: Tens of Thousands Gather for Torah Event
body: Tens of thousands of bnei yeshiva from across Eretz Yisroel attended the Amudei Olam gathering at the Pais Arena in Yerushalayim, an event organized by Ichud Bnei HaYeshivos under the leadership of gedolei Yisroel Rav Dov Landau and Rav Moshe Hillel Hirsch.

title: New Yorkers in Israel Vote
body: Rabbi Chaim V'Chessed notes that New Yorkers in Israel can participate in the NYC mayoral election if they've registered to vote in the past and plan to return. Registration closed Oct 25, 2025.
